what's the verb from this noun ( aberration ) ? , and I've found a lot of the nouns or adjectives in English that we can't derive the verbs from . Why ? How can we derive nouns, adjectives, and regular verbs through fixed rules (and is it possible to derive nouns and adjectives from irregular verbs, and are there rules for that) and how do we know that some nouns and adjectives are nouns and adjectives in themselves and verbs cannot be derived from them and vice versa in deriving nouns and adjectives from the root of verbs as well and is it possible to derive nouns and adjectives through the verb or the root of the verb or derive verbs from nouns and adjectives and are there nouns and adjectives that do not have verb sources and are only nouns and adjectives . These are very important and essential questions for me because I am studying English interestingly and every day, so I hope to answer all of these questions if you please
